turns.question: During this hospital admission, has patient 26922 ever had an arterial bp mean above 78.0?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from chartevents where chartevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 26922 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) and chartevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'arterial bp mean' and d_items.linksto = 'chartevents' ) and chartevents.valuenum > 78.0

turns.question: Has the arterial bp mean exceeded 78.0 again?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from chartevents where chartevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 26922 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) and chartevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'arterial bp mean' and d_items.linksto = 'chartevents' ) and chartevents.valuenum > 78.0 and chartevents.charttime > '2102-07-25 10:45:00'

q_tag: has_verb the {vital_name} of patient {patient_id} been ever [comparison] than {vital_value} [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: For patient 10855, what was the most recent output type recorded today during an ICU stay?
turns.query: select d_items.label from d_items where d_items.itemid in ( select outputevents.itemid from outputevents where outputevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 10855 ) ) and datetime(outputevents.charttime,'start of day') = datetime('2105-12-17 17:00:00','start of day','-0 day') order by outputevents.charttime DESC limit 1 )

turns.question: Is the latest recorded ICU output still urine out foley?
turns.query: select d_items.label from d_items where d_items.itemid in ( select outputevents.itemid from outputevents where outputevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 10855 ) ) and datetime(outputevents.charttime,'start of day') = datetime('2105-12-17 17:30:00','start of day','-0 day') order by outputevents.charttime DESC limit 1 )

q_tag: what was the name of the output that patient {patient_id} [time_filter_exact1] had [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: Has patient 14467 had any arterial bp [diastolic] readings within the normal range today?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from chartevents where chartevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 14467 ) ) and chartevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'arterial bp [diastolic]' and d_items.linksto = 'chartevents' ) and chartevents.valuenum between diastolic_bp_lower and diastolic_bp_upper and datetime(chartevents.charttime,'start of day') = datetime('2105-12-02 09:30:00','start of day','-0 day')

turns.question: Any additional arterial bp [diastolic] readings in the normal range?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from chartevents where chartevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 14467 ) ) and chartevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'arterial bp [diastolic]' and d_items.linksto = 'chartevents' ) and chartevents.valuenum between diastolic_bp_lower and diastolic_bp_upper and datetime(chartevents.charttime,'start of day') = datetime('2105-12-02 09:45:00','start of day','-0 day') and chartevents.charttime > '2105-12-02 09:30:00'

q_tag: has_verb the {vital_name} of patient {patient_id} been normal [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: For patient 9151, what was the lowest phosphate each month over the past three years?
turns.query: select min(labevents.valuenum) from labevents where labevents.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 9151 ) and labevents.itemid in ( select d_labitems.itemid from d_labitems where d_labitems.label = 'phosphate' ) and datetime(labevents.charttime) >= datetime('2103-01-01 00:12:00','-3 year') group by strftime('%y-%m',labevents.charttime)

turns.question: Change in the latest monthly minimum phosphate?
turns.query: select min(labevents.valuenum) from labevents where labevents.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 9151 ) and labevents.itemid in ( select d_labitems.itemid from d_labitems where d_labitems.label = 'phosphate' ) and datetime(labevents.charttime) >= datetime('2103-01-01 02:01:00','-3 year') group by strftime('%y-%m',labevents.charttime)

q_tag: list the [unit_average] [agg_function] {lab_name} lab value of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_global1].

turns.question: For patient 31506, what is the total fluid intake administered so far during this hospital admission?
turns.query: select sum(inputevents_cv.amount) from inputevents_cv where inputevents_cv.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 31506 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) )

turns.question: How much has the total fluid intake increased?
turns.query: select sum(inputevents_cv.amount) from inputevents_cv where inputevents_cv.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 31506 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) )

q_tag: what was the total volume of intake that patient {patient_id} received [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: Has patient 5520 had any urine out foley output documented during this hospital admission?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from outputevents where outputevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 5520 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) and outputevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'urine out foley' and d_items.linksto = 'outputevents' )

turns.question: Any additional urine out foley output documented?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from outputevents where outputevents.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 5520 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) and outputevents.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = 'urine out foley' and d_items.linksto = 'outputevents' ) and outputevents.charttime > '2104-07-25 01:00:00'

q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} had any {output_name} output [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: For patient 69289, what is the average mcv during this hospital admission?
turns.query: select avg(labevents.valuenum) from labevents where labevents.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 69289 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) and labevents.itemid in ( select d_labitems.itemid from d_labitems where d_labitems.label = 'mcv' )

turns.question: By how much has the average mcv changed?
turns.query: select avg(labevents.valuenum) from labevents where labevents.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 69289 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) and labevents.itemid in ( select d_labitems.itemid from d_labitems where d_labitems.label = 'mcv' )

q_tag: what was the [agg_function] {lab_name} value of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_global1]?
